fr.cnrs.iees.graph

Interface Graph<N extends Node,E extends Edge>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MinimalGraph<N>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmutableGraphImpl, MutableGraphImpl

    public interface Graph<N extends Node,E extends Edge>
extends MinimalGraph<N>
    An immutable graph (no possibility to add or remove elements as it is now unrelated to List).
    Author:
    gignoux - 16 ao√ªt 2017
